name: Google IO Extended

venue.name: Buni Hub

description: GDG Mwanza aspire to host the Google I/O 2017 .  The event is scheduled to take place on Saturday the 29th July 2017. This event aims to bring together developers, students, IT professionals and curious minds not only in Mwanza and the regions nearby to experience and learn more about the latest Google technologies.There will be some hands-on labs, where attendees can test what they've learned and get help from experts. In addition there will an informative talks on the latest Google technologies.

name: GDG Devfest Tanzania 2017

venue.name: Buni Hub

description: Devfest Tanzania  2017 will be one of the best event ever happen,This event will take place in Dar es Salaam  Tanzania and is aimed of gathering developers from Mwanza and developers in Dar es Salaam for the sake  of  bringing together techies for one filled with learning and networking opportunities. The day will entail tech talks, video showcase, hands on session and demos focused on Firebase, Android O and Women Techmakers.

name: Study Jam on Mobile Sites Certification Web GDG Mwanza

venue.name: South Nyanza Conference at Mwanza in Tanzania

description:
Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content.Typically, Study jams focus on completing a course, but some may focus on mastering a skill or product area.

Why do GDG Mwanza host study jam on mobile web skills? Mobile now accounts for over half of all web traffic. Users expect their small screen experiences to be as quick and intuitive as those on desktop. But making  the mobile web fast and easy takes some special skills. 53 percent of mobile visitors will leave if a page takes more than three seconds to load. The average  page takes 22 seconds to load, so collectively we're losing a lot of mobile users and giving them a bad experience  along the way. Speed is only one part of the picture when creating great mobile experience

name: Cloud Study Jam GDG Mwanza 2018

venue.name: South Nyanza Conference at Mwanza in Tanzania

description:
• What we'll do
Study Jams is a community-run study groups for students on Google Developers content, on various product topics. GDG Mwanza will run Study Jams to raise the technical proficiency of our global community members through the highest possible course completion rate.

Once you attend the event you will be eligible for the following
- Learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
- Learn how Docker and Kubernetes work, or learn how to process Big Data in the Cloud.
-Get access to Qwiklabs.com, a Google training tool, free of charge (a $70+ value).
-Get Google-hosted badges like this for their online profiles, to show potential employers what they know about Cloud computing.

• What to bring
laptop, charger, Latest Chrome/Firefox installed in your laptop

• Important to know
Bring your ticket

name: IWD GDG Mwanza 2018

venue.name: South Nyanza Conference at Mwanza in Tanzania

description:
• What we'll do
Women Techmakers is Google's global program and brand for women in technology. Kicked off in 2012 by, then VP of Google[x], Megan Smith, Women Techmakers is now led by Women in Technology Advocate Natalie Villalobos and a global team of Googlers who are passionate about empowering women in technology through increased visibility, community, and resources.

This event will feature hands-on coding workshops, inspiring speakers, and networking opportunities.

• What to bring
Notebook, pen, laptop.

• Important to know
Please come with your ticket

name: International Women's Day 2018 Mwanza

venue.name: Mwanza Tanzania

description:
• What we'll do
Women Techmakers is a program created by Google to celebrate International Women's Day and to highlight the talent of women in technology. In 2018, we’re organizing the second big edition in Mwanza as part of the special event we are looking forward to have 5 top inspiring women in the field of technology with theme of Mobile is the future.

• What to bring
Laptops

• Important to know

name: Google IO Extended Mwanza 2018

venue.name: South Nyanza Conference at Mwanza in Tanzania

description: Google I/O Extended events are focused on bringing the local developer community together to experience the keynote and other main Google I/O sessions. This event will also offer other unique activities target to developers such as Hackathons and Codelabs mostly on Cloud and Android.

name: Flutter Study Jam
description: Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants from Mwanza will come in person and support them to complete the course. Everyone, who completes the course will get a Google-offered Study Jam completion certificate and a profile badge, we will learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

venue.name: South Nyanza Conference at Mwanza in Tanzania

description: GDG DevFests are community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies. This year devfest event cover multiple product areas such as Android, Firebase, Google Assistant, Flutter, machine learning with TensorFlow, and Mobile Web

name: Devfest 2018 - GDG Mwanza

venue.name: South Nyanza Conference at Mwanza in Tanzania

description:
Google Developer Group (GDG Mwanza) is proud to announce DevFest 2018 - Mwanza, the largest annual community event series for the Google Developer Groups (GDG) program. Hundreds of GDG members around Mwanza are invited to this event that will be run through the day with expert who will provide deep dive to the latest Google Technology and products. The event will be on 03 November, 2018.

Our GDG organizers and communities are getting ready for the season, and are excited to host an event at Mwanza!

Whether you are an established developer, new to tech, or just curious about the community - come Mwanza and check out #DevFest18. Everyone is invited!

name: Android study jam

venue.name: Mwanza Tanzania

description: Come and we learn Android from Udacity

name: Cloud Study jam Mwanza

venue.name: Mwanza

description:
Details
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want.

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.
how_to_find_us: Open University  at Mkolani-near by TANESCO
